thread.title: Jenny made my visit perfect!
thread.title_full: Jenny made my visit perfect! - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TravelFanHartford_CT
title: Jenny made my visit perfect!
text: This is my first return since the new ownership. Jenny greeted me with a pleasant attitude and was so helpful in securing a room to meet my needs and ensure I could check in right away. She upgraded my room and then followed up with a call to ensure everything was ok. The personal touch and outstanding service is the reason I will return! Great hotel, great location and the new ownership is doing all the right things! Thank you Jenny and all that made my stay a great one!
